content: Who would I get in touch with to request promotion of a non-official event on the DNC's Mobilize feed? I'm doing a voter registration event in Pittsburgh this Friday and next Saturday and would love more publicity – and from the look of it, there's nothing happening on either of those dates that might conflict.
Hi <@201533180434448385> try https://events.democrats.org and click Host an Event at the top of the page.
Thanks! Bummer, it looks like these are the only options right now:
Maybe reach out to https://alleghenydems.com/ and see if they can work with you to promote your event in the local community.
